column4: I'm listening to streamripper, and select a shoutcast as a bookmark
when I want to go to that bookmark, it's incorrectly translated
it puts a comma in the url
seems that would be a bug to report
for example, if I select the radio button for the bookmark I just made....
this error pops up.....
Firefox can't find the server at www.977music,com.com.
it adds a comma in the url
how would I report this bug for streamripper?
all of them or just that one?
let me check
brb
and the answer to the bug report question is launchpad.net
I just bookmarked two additional shoutcast stations, and both of them have similar error, with comma in the  url
could that be a feisty thing>
never seen it myself - I think you mean streamtuner actually?
it seems a blatant error for program, that's why I wondered about feisty
as i said, I haven't seen it - and I use streamtuner and streamripper on feisty
okay, I am at launchpad
one more silly question
I selected the interface window to be displayed 'on top' of my screen, it disappeared, and I am not sure how to get it back
the interface sort of remind me of winamp
thank you for your reference
